name: Moneyons!
description:
**In-game videos and links will not work on Itch.io, sorry!**

A quirky puzzle game. You’re a Master of Coin, gifted with the ability to convert your life into magical money minions - Moneyons! Can you make it through the castle?

Controls:
  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Interact - E
  • Toggle Possessed Objects - SPACE
  • Aim Throws - MOUSE
Made by:

@AyoubGharbi11 (Unity Dev)

@Maytch (Unity Dev)

@Zugai89 (Pixel Artist)

@davekingcool (Sound Designer)
